backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables for a vibrant pink design, including global color tokens and typography settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Catamaran and Fredoka fonts and initializing the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering jokes, animated header, retro-themed UI elements, and randomized videos and articles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the current Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining the vibrant pink theme, typography, gloss heading effect, and utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/momMedia.ts: Defines curated lists of mom-themed videos and articles plus helper functions to shuffle and return random subsets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the site's theme.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s meta‑state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the joke website build.
